title: Journalism’s influencer obsession will age poorly
description: For more than a decade, social media didn’t just serve Black communities, immigrant communities, and young people — these communities built social media into the global force it became. They were the early adopters, the culture-makers, the organizers, the storytellers. Hyperlocal newsrooms were born on Facebook groups. WhatsApp became a lifeline for immigrant families. Instagram...
